title: Home
content:
Post convergence

I provide esoteric, eclectic, and enlightened digital integration and production services, including web design and development, illustration, online marketing, production, professional writing, and digital consultancy to authors and people working in the media industry.
excerpt: Post convergence I provide esoteric, eclectic, and enlightened digital integration and production services, including web design and development, illustration, online marketing, production, professional writing, and digital consultancy to authors and people working in the media industry.

acf.home_slide_2:
Mass media for the discerning masses

Not just for panicky news corporations, or cynical, cat-owning bloggers, it is the preserve of every keyboard-bashing, screen swiping citizen.

Online personalities bloom through connecting and channelling messages via social media, targeted content and online intrigue.
acf.home_slide_3:
Humanism uploaded

As well as digital design and production, my research interests include writing fiction, internet-based narrative constructs, philosophy, law and politics in the information society.
